This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, store, use and distribute information through any of the Thalamus services, however accessed (the "Service"), our websites and applications, including but not limited to www.thalamusgme.com (the "Site"), as well as any related documentation, software and other properties we control (together with the Service and the Site, the "Properties").
We may receive data from third parties and add it to information we have collected about you.
We want you to know what information we collect and what we do with it.

We may also use aggregated, de-identified, or other anonymous data for research purposes, which may involve collaborators and contractors.
We may also use personal information and de-identified data we receive from partners such as AAMC for data analysis and research that may be conducted internally for research and development purposes, including development or improvements to products, Services or Properties.

We may aggregate, de-identify or anonymize data from personal information we collect by removing information that makes the data personally identifiable to you.
We may use this anonymous or deidentified data and share it with our customers and third parties for any lawful business purposes, including to deliver Services, analyze and improve our Services, and to promote our business.
We may also collect your IP address and other unique identifiers for your applicable mobile or other device.
We may also collect your IP address and other unique identifiers for your applicable mobile or other device.
For our internal purposes, we may retain logs of all comments or messages that you post or send through our Services or Properties or via any partner or customer facilities.
We use Billing Information solely to check the financial qualifications of prospective customers and to collect payment for premium services or products.
If we charge fees for any of the Services, we may also collect personal financial and billing information as defined below.
No one under age 13 may provide any Personal Information to or on the Service and Properties.

If you are a customer or partner of Thalamus ("Customer"), Thalamus may collect personal information from your organization or your organization's users ("End Users") to the extent that you've integrated your application or services with our Properties or otherwise provided personal information to Thalamus.
Thalamus collects personal information from you as a customer, user or visitor of our Properties.

No one under age 13 may provide any Personal Information to or on the Service and Properties.
We may also use personal information and de-identified data we receive from partners such as AAMC for data analysis and research that may be conducted internally for research and development purposes, including development or improvements to products, Services or Properties.
We may collect additional Personal Information about you from third-party websites, social media platforms, and/or sources providing publicly available information to help us manage your account, provide the Services to you, maintain our customer/visitor lists, provide feedback, for authentication purposes, for service improvement, provide updates and announcements, address issues like malicious use of the Service or preventing fraud, and for marketing and advertising purposes.
We may receive Personal Information from the AAMC for data analysis and research that may be conducted internally for research and development purposes, including development of improvements in existing and future products and services.

We will retain your Personal Information for as long as we need to provide you Services,  and as required by law or necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies.
Any Personal Information collected via survey ("Survey Data") will be used only by Thalamus unless we specify otherwise when we ask you to participate in a survey.
